name: Life Game
description: Open World, first person life simulation
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Celeron G3950 @ 3.00GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 610m 2GB and above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
